00048 class IScreenElement
00049 {
00050 public:
00051         virtual HRESULT VOnRestore() = 0;
00052         virtual HRESULT VOnRender(double fTime, float fElapsedTime) = 0;
00053         virtual void VOnUpdate(int deltaMilliseconds) = 0;
00054 
00055         virtual int VGetZOrder() const = 0;
00056         virtual void VSetZOrder(int const zOrder) = 0;
00057         virtual bool VIsVisible() const = 0;
00058         virtual void VSetVisible(bool visible) = 0;
00059 
00060         virtual LRESULT CALLBACK VOnMsgProc( AppMsg msg )=0;
00061 
00062         virtual ~IScreenElement() { };
00063         virtual bool const operator <(IScreenElement const &other) { return VGetZOrder() < other.VGetZOrder(); }
00064 };

00066 typedef unsigned int ActorId;

00068 class IActor
00069 {
00070         friend class IGame;
00071 
00072 public:
00073         // Yuk-these shouldn't be public
00074         virtual void VSetMat(const Mat4x4 &newMat)=0;
00075         virtual void VSetID(ActorId id)=0;
00076 public:
00077         virtual ~IActor() { }
00078         virtual Mat4x4 const &VGetMat()=0;
00079         virtual const std::string VGetType()=0;
00080         virtual optional<ActorId> VGetID()=0; 
00081         virtual bool VIsPhysical()=0;
00082         virtual bool VIsGeometrical()=0;
00083         virtual void VOnUpdate(int deltaMilliseconds)=0;        
00084 };

00090 class IGame
00091 {
00092 public:
00093         virtual shared_ptr<IActor> VGetActor(const ActorId id)=0;
00094         virtual void VAddActor(shared_ptr<IActor> actor, struct ActorParams *p)=0;
00095         virtual void VRemoveActor(ActorId id)=0;
00096         virtual bool VLoadGame(std::string gameName)=0;
00097         virtual void VOnUpdate(float time, float elapsedTime)=0;
00098         virtual void VChangeState(enum BaseGameState newState)=0;
00099         virtual void VMoveActor(const ActorId id, Mat4x4 const &mat)=0;
00100 };

00137 //
00138 // IKeyboardHandler Description         - Chapter 8, page 232
00139 // IMouseHandler Description            - Chapter 8, page 232
00140 // IJoystickHandler Description         - Chapter 8, page 233
00141 // IGamepadHandler Description          - Chapter 8, page 233
00142 //
00143 // These are the public APIs for any object that implements reactions
00144 // to events sent by hardware user interface devices.
00145 //
00146 // Note: IJoystickHandler and IGamepadHandler are not currently
00147 //       implemented anywhere in the codebase. Theu are here
00148 //       as examples, and could require modification to actually work!
00149 //
00151 
00152 class IKeyboardHandler
00153 {
00154 public:
00155         virtual bool VOnKeyDown(const BYTE c)=0;
00156         virtual bool VOnKeyUp(const BYTE c)=0;
00157 };
00158 
00159 class IMouseHandler
00160 {
00161 public:
00162         virtual bool VOnMouseMove(const CPoint &mousePos) = 0;
00163         virtual bool VOnLButtonDown(const CPoint &mousePos) = 0;
00164         virtual bool VOnLButtonUp(const CPoint &mousePos) = 0;
00165         virtual bool VOnRButtonDown(const CPoint &mousePos) = 0;
00166         virtual bool VOnRButtonUp(const CPoint &mousePos) = 0;
00167 };
00168 
00169 class IJoystickHandler
00170 {
00171         virtual bool VOnButtonDown(int const button, int const pressure)=0;
00172         virtual bool VOnButtonUp(int const button)=0;
00173         virtual bool VOnJoystick(float const x, float const y)=0;
00174 };
00175 
00176 class IGamepadHandler
00177 {
00178         virtual bool VOnTrigger(bool const left, float const pressure)=0;
00179         virtual bool VOnButtonDown(int const button, int const pressure)=0;
00180         virtual bool VOnButtonUp(int const button)=0;
00181         virtual bool VOnDirectionalPad(int directionFlags)=0;
00182         virtual bool VOnThumbstick(int const stickNum, float const x, float const y)=0;
00183 };

00206 // RenderPass Description
00207 //
00208 //   3D scenes are drawn in passes - this enum defines the render passes
00209 //   supported by the 3D scene graph created by class Scene.
00211 
00212 enum RenderPass
00213 {
00214         RenderPass_0,
00215         RenderPass_Static = RenderPass_0,
00216         RenderPass_Actor,
00217         RenderPass_Sky,
00218         RenderPass_Last
00219 };

00225 //
00226 //   This is the public interface for nodes in a 3D scene graph.

00229 class Scene;

00231 
00232 class ISceneNode
00233 {
00234 protected:
00235 
00236 public:
00237         virtual const SceneNodeProperties * const VGet() const=0;
00238 
00239         virtual void VSetTransform(const Mat4x4 *toWorld, const Mat4x4 *fromWorld=NULL)=0;
00240 
00241         virtual HRESULT VPreRender(Scene *pScene)=0;
00242         virtual HRESULT VRender(Scene *pScene)=0;
00243         virtual HRESULT VPostRender(Scene *pScene)=0;
00244 
00245         virtual bool VAddChild(shared_ptr<ISceneNode> kid)=0;
00246         virtual bool VRemoveChild(ActorId id)=0;
00247         virtual HRESULT VRenderChildren(Scene *pScene)=0;
00248         virtual HRESULT VOnRestore(Scene *pScene)=0;
00249         virtual bool VIsVisible(Scene *pScene) const=0;
00250 
00251         virtual HRESULT VOnUpdate(Scene *, DWORD const elapsedMs)=0;
00252

00258 // IGamePhysics Description
00259 //
00260 //   The interface defintion for a generic physics API.
00262 
00263 class NxActor;
00264 class IGamePhysics
00265 {
00266 public:
00267 
00268         // Initialiazation and Maintenance of the Physics World
00269         virtual bool VInitialize()=0;
00270         virtual void VSyncVisibleScene() = 0;
00271         virtual void VOnUpdate(int deltaMilliseconds) = 0; 
00272 
00273         // Initialization of Physics Objects
00274         virtual void VAddSphere(float radius, IActor *actor, float specificGravity, enum PhysicsMaterial mat)=0;
00275         virtual void VAddBox(const Vec3& dimensions, IActor *gameActor, float specificGravity, enum PhysicsMaterial mat) = 0;
00276         virtual void VAddConvexMesh(Vec3 *verts, int numTris, IActor *actor, float specificGravity, enum PhysicsMaterial mat)=0;
00277         virtual void VAddPointCloud(Vec3 *verts, int numPoints, IActor *gameActor, float specificGravity, enum PhysicsMaterial mat)=0;
00278         virtual void VRemoveActor(ActorId id)=0;
00279 
00280         // Debugging
00281         virtual void VRenderDiagnostics() = 0;
00282 
00283         // Physics world modifiers
00284         virtual void VCreateTrigger(const Vec3 &pos, const float dim, int triggerID)=0;
00285         virtual void VApplyForce(const Vec3 &dir, float newtons, ActorId aid)=0;
00286         virtual void VApplyTorque(const Vec3 &dir, float newtons, ActorId aid)=0;
00287         virtual bool VKinematicMove(const Mat4x4 &mat, ActorId aid)=0;
00288 
00289         virtual NxActor *GetActor(const ActorId id)const=0;
00290 
00291         virtual ~IGamePhysics() { };
00292 };
